title: Episode #13: ADD and ADHD Part 2
description: As a child, Dr. Avery Jackson was labeled  ADHD. His mother did not accept the label and he went on to become one of the top neurosurgeons in the U.S. In this episode we discuss his incredible story, and how he overcame the ADHD label without medication.
dc:creator: Dr. Caroline Leaf
